requirements.summary: Restore all frontend files to Version 24 state, removing changes from Versions 25-28
acceptanceCriteria: All frontend code matches Version 24 state
No artifacts from Versions 25-28 remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Restore App.tsx to Version 24 state, reverting any routing, context providers, or component changes introduced in later versions
Restore main.tsx entry point to Version 24 configuration, reverting any provider or initialization changes
Restore index.html to Version 24 state, reverting any meta tag, script, or link changes
Restore global styles and Tailwind configuration to Version 24, removing any custom animations, utilities, or theme changes from later versions
Restore Tailwind configuration to Version 24, reverting any theme extensions, color scheme changes, or plugin modifications
Restore PWA manifest to Version 24 configuration
Restore landing page to Version 24 layout and content, removing any features added in later versions
Restore login page to Version 24 authentication flow and UI
Restore command center dashboard to Version 24 state, removing any KPI cards or features added later
